q: billion, or 67pc while revenues from outside of the United States totaled US$ 4.38 billion, representing 52pc of total revenues. "Q4 marked a terrific end to a stellar year," said Eric Schmidt . Our strong performance has been driven by a rapidly growing digital economy, continuous product innovation that benefits both users and advertisers, and by the extraordinary momentum of our newer businesses, such as display and mobile. These results give us the optimism and confidence to invest heavily in future growth- investments that will benefit our users, Google and the wider web. Google changes its management structure While Eric Schmidt will step down as CEO he will assume the role of executive chairman focusing on deals, partnerships and broader business relationships as well as advising founders Larry Page

Eric Schmidt , Larry Page and co-founder Sergey Brin lavished ebullient praise on one another. " Eric Schmidt has clearly done an outstanding job," Page said. A few moments later, Eric Schmidt sent out a peppy little tweet, Day-to-day adult supervision no longer needed! But surely there's more to the story.
